virtual uint32 FileHandler::getModificationDate (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns the modification date of the file.

Currently it is enough if the date is less for old files and more for new files.

Implemented in UnixFileHandler.

virtual int FileHandler::read (  uint8 *  bytes,
int  maxLength,
FileHandlerListener *  listener
)  [pure virtual]
 

Reads maxLength bytes from the file.

Calls the listener when done. If listener is NULL the call will by synchronous and the number of bytes written will be returned.

Implemented in UnixFileHandler.

virtual void FileHandler::setPos (  int  pos  )  [pure virtual]
 

Sets the read and write positions of the stream to the sent-in value.

-1 should set the position to end of file.

Implemented in UnixFileHandler.

virtual int FileHandler::tell (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Returns the read/write position in the stream.

Implemented in UnixFileHandler.

virtual int FileHandler::write (  const uint8 *  bytes,
int  length,
FileHandlerListener *  listener
)  [pure virtual]
 

Writes bytes to the file of the FileHandler.

Calls the listener when it is done. If listener is NULL the call will by synchronous and the number of bytes written will be returned.

Implemented in UnixFileHandler.
